context.p: To expand collapsed elements manually, do the following:

step.info: To expand the current collapsed element (but not its child elements if some of them are collapsed), do one of the following:

choices.choice: Right-click the element and select Expand from the context menu.
Double-click the yellow rectangle of the collapsed element in the Editing Window.

step.cmd: Expand a collapsed element and its collapsed children.
step.info: To expand the current element and all its collapsed child elements, do one of the following:

choices.choice: Right-click the element and select Expand Subtree from the context menu.

step.info: To expand all the collapsed elements in the document, choose View Expand All .
